description: We are seeking a highly motivated individual to join our team as a software engineer. In this role, you will work on developing and maintaining our flagship product. The ideal candidate will have experience with Python and JavaScript.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain the company's flagship product, write clean and efficient code, collaborate with the team on software design and architecture, troubleshoot and debug issues as they arise
education_requirement: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
experience: At least 2 years of experience as a software engineer
